api_list.name: Heads / Tails
api_list.description: Returns an outcome. Either heads or tails
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com/headstails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com/headstails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "coin-flip1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
